text: unhonne kaha, "jo spasht nishaaniyaan hamaare saamane aa chukee hai unake muqaabale mein saugandh hai us satta kee, jisane hamen paida kiya hai, ham kadaapi tujhe praathamikata nahin de sakate. to jo kuchh too faisala karanevaala hai, kar le. too bas isee saansaarik jeevan ka faisala kar sakata hai
